tags.name: umb-button-group
tags.description:
### Umbraco button group 

 Usage: 

 ```html 
 <umb-button-group 
    default-button='{object}' 
    sub-buttons='{array}' 
    [state='{string}'] 
    [direction='{string}'] 
    [float='{string}']>
</umb-button-group> 
 ```

attributes.name: default-button
attributes.description:
The model of the default button. 

 Type: `object`

attributes.name: state
attributes.description:
Set a progress state on the button. 

 Options: `busy`, `error`, `init`, `success` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description:
Set the direction of the dropdown. 

 Options: `down`, `up` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: float
attributes.description:
Set the float of the dropdown. 

 Options: `left`, `right` 

 Type: `string`

references.name: Umbraco API Docs V8 > Umbraco button group directive `umbButtonGroup`
